      • getMessageNameByUid

        public MaildirMessageName getMessageNameByUid(MailboxSession session,
                                     Long uid)
                                       throws MailboxException
        Searches the uid list for a certain uid and returns the according MaildirMessageName
        Parameters:
        session -
        uid - The uid to search for
        Returns:
        The MaildirMessageName that belongs to the uid
        Throws:
        IOException - If the uidlist file cannot be found or read
        MailboxException

      • getUidMap

        public SortedMap<Long,MaildirMessageName> getUidMap(MailboxSession session,
                                           long from,
                                           long to)
                                             throws MailboxException
        Reads all uids between the two boundaries from the folder and returns them as a sorted map together with their corresponding MaildirMessageNames.
        Parameters:
        session -
        from - The lower uid limit
        to - The upper uid limit. -1 disables the upper limit
        Returns:
        a Map whith all uids in the given range and associated MaildirMessageNames
        Throws:
        MailboxException - if there is a problem with the uid list file

      • getUidMap

        public SortedMap<Long,MaildirMessageName> getUidMap(MailboxSession session,
                                           FilenameFilter filter,
                                           long from,
                                           long to)
                                             throws MailboxException
        Throws:
        MailboxException

      • getUidMap

        public SortedMap<Long,MaildirMessageName> getUidMap(MailboxSession session,
                                           FilenameFilter filter,
                                           int limit)
                                             throws MailboxException
        Reads all uids from the uid list file which match the given filter and returns as many of them as a sorted map as the limit specifies.
        Parameters:
        session -
        filter - The file names of all returned items match the filter. The dir argument to FilenameFilter.accept(dir, name) will always be null.
        limit - The number of items; a limit smaller then 1 disables the limit
        Returns:
        A Map with all uids and associated MaildirMessageNames
        Throws:
        MailboxException - if there is a problem with the uid list file

      • getRecentMessages

        public SortedMap<Long,MaildirMessageName> getRecentMessages(MailboxSession session)
                                                     throws MailboxException
        Creates a map of recent messages.
        Parameters:
        session -
        Returns:
        A Map with all uids and associated MaildirMessageNames of recent messages
        Throws:
        MailboxException - If there is a problem with the uid list file

      • stripMetaFromName

        public static String stripMetaFromName(String fileName)
        Takes the name of a message file and returns only the base name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the message file
        Returns:
        the file name without meta data, the unmodified name if it doesn't have meta data

      • delete

        public MaildirMessageName delete(MailboxSession session,
                        long uid)
                          throws MailboxException
        Retrieves the file belonging to the given uid, deletes it and updates the uid list.
        Parameters:
        uid - The uid of the message to delete
        Returns:
        The MaildirMessageName of the deleted message
        Throws:
        MailboxException - If the file cannot be deleted of there is a problem with the uid list
